description: This file defines a React functional component 'TodoCard' that renders a to-do item with actions for editing, deleting, and toggling completion status. It handles props for todo data and callback functions, and includes accessibility features.

methods.name: TodoCard({ todo, onEdit, onDelete, onToggle })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a to-do item with action buttons for edit, delete, and toggle completion.
